doc.ContractDescription: DELIVERY ORDER FOR 100 EACH NSN 1680-01-560-8741, P/N 70500-52851-101, SEAT, AIRCRAFT FOR UH-60.

WE PROPOSE TO CONTINUE OUR DETECTOR DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM IN X-RAY ASTRONOMY. UNDER OUR CURRENT GRANT WE HAVE DEVELOPED A NEW TYPE OF SILICON IMAGING DETECTOR, ALONG WITH A NOVEL READ OUT INTEGRATED CIRCUIT THAT IS BONDED TO THE DETECTOR. HERE WE PROPOSE TO BUILD AND TEST THESE INNOVATIVE DETECTORS, WHICH COULD POTENTIALLY BE THE OPTIMUM CHOICE FOR MANY FU-TURE X-RAY MISSIONS, PARTICULARLY THOSE WITH FOCUSED OPTICS AND/OR LARGE EFFECTIVE AREA. THIS PROPOSAL SUPPORTS NASA'S GOALS OF TECHNICAL ADVANCEMENT OF TECHNOLOGIES SUITABLE FOR FUTURE MISSIONS AND TRAINING OF GRADUATE STUDENTS.
